scripts.build: (cd /tmp && if [ ! -d typewiz ]; then git clone https://github.com/starpit/typewiz.git -b coverage-report && cd typewiz && yarn install && yarn build; fi)
scripts.typecov: SCRIPTDIR=$(cd $(dirname "$0") && pwd); TSCONFIG="$SCRIPTDIR"/../../packages/kui-builder/tsconfig.json; npm run build && (cd /tmp/typewiz && node node_modules/typewiz/dist/cli.js coverage "$TSCONFIG" -o /tmp/typecov.json)
